scripts.run:nightly: node -e "const d=new Date(Date.now()-86400000).toISOString().slice(0,10);console.log(d)" | xargs -I {} sh -c "npm run ingest -- --date {} && npm run post:nightly -- --date {}"
scripts.run:nightly:win: for /f "usebackq delims=" %d in (`node -e "d=new Date(Date.now()-86400000).toISOString().slice(0,10);console.log(d)"`) do (npm run ingest -- --date %d && npm run post:nightly -- --date %d)
